name: LunchWithLupe
description:
Leapin' Lizards-er crocodiles...

Lunch with Lupe is a game about a gator with an appetite.

Lead Lupe through the Loops to their lunch.

How to play

Click and Drag the Mouse to create a Loop.

Create Loops near Lupe to launch Lupe towards theirLunch!

The bigger the loop, the more OOMPH!

Made with Love by AliveDrive and SugarSores for Bolt Jam #7!
